wblut.hemesh

Class HE_Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Element
      • wblut.hemesh.HE_MeshStructure
        • wblut.hemesh.HE_Mesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WB_HasData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HE_DynamicMesh

    public class HE_Mesh
extends HE_MeshStructure
implements WB_HasData
    Half-edge mesh data structure.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)

      • collapseHalfedge

        public boolean collapseHalfedge(HE_Halfedge he)
        Collapse halfedge. Start vertex is removed. Degenerate faces are removed. This function can result in non-manifold meshes.
        Parameters:
        he - the he
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • collapseEdge

        public boolean collapseEdge(HE_Edge e)
        Collapse edge. End vertices are averaged. Degenerate faces are removed. This function can result in non-manifold meshes.
        Parameters:
        e - edge to collapse
        Returns:
        true, if successful
